resources.string: Q. What\'s your favorite music today?
Today, I am happy. Because I played football.

string-array.name: queList
string-array.item: Q2. How was your day today?
Q3. Who helped to make your day today?
Q4. Where is the memorable place and why?
Q5. What is the best dish that you had today?
Q6. Do you have any plans for tomorrow?
Q7. Do you have a thing that you want to have?
Q8. Choose a friend and describe him/her.
Q9. Choose a song which can reflect your feeling today.
Q10. If you made mistakes today, why did you?
Q11. If you were stressed out today, why are you?
Q12. If you can go back tomorrow what do you want to fix?
Q13. Is there a video that you’ve watched with interest today?
Q14. Please, pick a picture and explain why you pick it.
Q15. Please, explain about a movie that you watched recently.
Q16. Please, write an activity that you liked to do when you are hanging out with your friends.
